data.text: @styhl66 Hi Tomas, we're sorry but all our channels are very busy. Our Customer Service Center is available daily from 8:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m. From experience I recommend calling between 8:00 a.m. and 9:00 a.m. as the waiting time is less than ten minutes. Kind regards, Ivana

@PaulMal09571271 Hi Paul, I am sorry that you had to wait so long. We currently have a lot of calls again.  Please be specific and send us your booking reference and/or your ticket number in a DM. We'll be happy to assist you further. Best regards, Christiane https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s
@KMilosic Hi Klementina, I've just replied to your other posting. Best regards, Christiane

data.text: @shilermahm Hi there, I've just replied to your other posting. Best regards, Christiane
@olir08525577 Hallo, es tut uns leid, dass die Anzeige fehlerhaft ist. Bitte versuch es doch über ein anderes Endgerät. Liebe Grüße, Christiane

@noormangj Hi there, we are sorry to hear you were facing difficulties with your reservation. If your request has not been solved in the meantime please send us your booking code in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris

@kooii Hi there, Flights to Lviv (LWO) continue to operate. We continue to monitor the situation closely and are in close contact with national and international authorities. You can check the status of your flight anytime on our homepage via "My Bookings" Kind regards, Chris
@notBsilenced Hi there, thank you for reaching out. Please send us your booking code in a DM. We´ll gladly check your baggage allowance. Kind regards, Derya
@kooii Hi there, our flights to Lviv are still on schedule. You can check the status of your flight here https://t.co/6BV8VvcqUv. Kind regards, Derya

urls.title: Flight Status & Itinerary
urls.description: We aim to inform you promptly about any unforeseen changes, such as a delay. Check your flight status and current flight information.

data.text: @Tom_de_Belfore Hi Tom, I have already replied to your other message. Kind regards, Derya

@cunidotco @Expedia @ExpediaGroup @ExpediaAsia Hi there, thank you for reaching out. Did you already fill out the contact form regarding your inquiry? If not please use the following link https://t.co/QF7PSL2mVI to do so. Kind regards, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

data.text: @Cathy19062262 Hi Cathy, thank you for reaching out. Sure, please send us your booking code and your seat preference in a DM. Kind regards, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s
@okanovic_d Hi Dusan, we apologize for any inconvenience caused. Is there anything that we can assist you with? Kind regards, Chris

#Servus and welcome back #OlympicTeamAustria 🇦🇹
Today the last athletes touched down in Vienna with extra valuable goods on board 🥇🥈🥉 We hope you had a pleasant flight with Austrian Airlines ✈️ Congrats to all athletes on their fantastic performance in #Beijing2022 https://t.co/4An69LrYD1

data.text: @lizvlx Hi there, if there's anything we can assist you with, please send us a DM. Kind regards, Ivana
@mylonov Hi there, we do not operate to/from Minsk but at the moment we're not suspending flights to/from Moscow. Kind regards, Ivana

@victoriamartint Hi Victoria, we’re sorry to hear that your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Please use the following online form: https://t.co/62YZ6n224l to file our complaint. Best regards, Christiane

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @radogado Hi Radoslav, thanks for informing us. We've already sent it to our respective department. Best regards, Christiane
@voyageur221 Hi there, please let us know what your issue is about. We'll try to assist you further. Best regards, Christiane
@SakClasses Hi, please contact the respective authorities to get the needed information. I am sorry that we cannot assist you in this matter. Kind regards, Christine
@margotofan Hi Margaret, if it was your fault we will not provide hotelaccommodation. Kind regards, Sara

@LilzBorgz [2/2] I can assure you that we are in full commitment to you and we are doing everything so that we can quickly offer you our usual service again. Can we help you? Kind regards, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

@LilzBorgz [1/2] Hi Lily, I am sorry that you had to wait so long. We currently have a lot of calls again. At the moment, our passengers also need more time for their concerns. Of course, we also want to take the time that each passenger needs.
@rayajalabi Hi Raya, please send us your booking code and your new travel date in a DM. We´ll check the availability for you. Kind regards, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

@margotofan Hi Margaret, in case of a flight irregularity that causes missing your connecting flight by exceeding the minimum connecting time of 30 min, we will of course provide hotel accomadation. For more information regarding passenger rights please click here https://t.co/WyH88bd9jp

urls.title: Passenger rights
urls.description: On this page you will find information about passenger rights at Austrian Airlines.

data.text: @margotofan Hi, please send us your booking code in a DM. Kind regards, Christine
@rscano Hi Roberto, thank you for reaching out. Please be so kind and provide us with your flight details in a DM. Kind regards, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s
@S_shaff Hi Letellier, please send us your booking code in a DM. We´ll gladly take a closer look into your reservation. Kind regards, Derya
@skylermeyer Hi there, thank you for your feedback. We already forwarded it to our responsible colleagues. Kind regards, Chris
@agirvan0 Hi, please send us your inquiry in a DM. Kind regards, Sara

@8pouce Hi, please fill out our online form via https://t.co/i2nywVjKmI and attach a screenshot of your bank account statement with the double charge, so our colleagues can look into this matter. Thank you and kind regards, Sarah

data.text: @S_shaff Hi there, please advise your booking reference and/or your ticket number. Kind regards, Ivana

#ServusNEOS: Our fleet gets a modern, fuel-efficient addition!🛫

As of August 2022 four new A320neos will replace our older aircraft. The NEOS do not only count with an innovative airspace cabin but also emit up to 3,700 tons of CO2 less per year.

👉 https://t.co/jcN5HXOZKj

@victoriamartint Hi Victoria, for your stay in transit only, no PCR test is necessary. If your end destination requires a test, you will be asked to show your test result before boarding the flight. Best regards, Christiane

Today, the aircraft with the prelude to the famous Waltz on its exterior dances its way to Taipei for all necessary maintenance work before returning to regular operations. In spring, the “Spirit of Austria” will again welcome you on board with Johann Strauss’ masterpiece!🎼

2/2

Of course it had to be on the 155th birthday of the “Donauwalzer”, the anthem of Austrian Airlines, that our last B777, the “Spirit of Austria”, is being woken up from storage! 🎵 ✈️ 💤

1/2 https://t.co/W38JDV4pAZ
@thaikoarl1 Hi, wie bereits erwähnt können wir darüber keine Information geben. Bitte wende dich hierfür direkt an die zuständigen Behörden. Liebe Grüße, Christine

@Lortho Hi David, I am sorry that you had to wait so long. We currently have a lot of calls again. At the moment, our passengers also need more time for their concerns. Of course, we also want to take the time that each passenger needs. Please send us your inquiry in a DM. Kind regards https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

@thaikoarl1 Hi, für genaue Informationen zu den aktuell gültigen Einreise- und Quarantänebestimmungen, bitten wir dich dich direkt an die zuständigen thailändischen Behörden, oder das Gesundheitsministerium zu wenden. Freundliche Grüße, Chris

@thaikoarl1 Hi, Austrian Airlines halten sich an die Einreisebestimmungen der jeweiligen nationalen Behörden. Bitte kontaktiere die jeweiligen Behörden bezüglich der aktuellen Bestimmungen https://t.co/Cx836RRkQP Liebe Grüße, Christine
@ProfOnderco Hi Michal, please send us your booking code, so we can have a closer look. Kind regards, Sarah
@EdurneMG Hi Edume, we regret to read that you missed your connecting flight.Please contact our colleagues at the service center concerning a rebooking. Kind regards, Christine

@pmac05188036 Hi, please send us your booking code in a DM. We will be happy to have a closer look.
Kind regards, Sara
@gass Hallo Oliver, bitte sende uns in einer DM deine E-Mail Adresse damit wir prüfen können ob wir deine Anfrage erhalten haben. Liebe Grüße, Christine
@ggvenegas Hi there, I've just replied to your DM. Best regards, Christiane
@ggvenegas Hi, please find all information about our service on board here: https://t.co/o5kRSz2get Best regards, Christiane

urls.title: Austrian Melangerie
urls.description: Welcome to Austrian Melangerie: Enjoy selected Austrian dishes and regional snacks on our short- and medium-haul flights.

data.text: @Kkrasnosilska Hi Karyna, unfortunately, we cannot find any inquiry with this email address. Please send us your inquiry once again to impressum@austrian.com directly. Our colleagues will forward it to the respective department. Best regards, Christiane
@Kkrasnosilska Hi, which email address did you use, so we can check if we received your inquiry. Kind regards, Sarah
@lendmeyourliver Hi, we are sorry for the inconvenience caused. Please tell us your booking code and we'll have a closer look at your online check-in. Kind regards, James
@sweetnothings78 Hi, sorry for the inconvenience caused. Please direct message us your booking code and advise how we can assist you. Kind regards, James https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s
@kkrasnosilska Hi Karyna, if you have filled out our contact form, our respective colleagues will contact you asap. Thank you for your patience. Kind regards, James
@someone_matcha Hi Floriana, please send us your mail reference number in a DM so we can have a closer look at it. Best regards, Christiane
@Kkrasnosilska Hi there, please send your inquiry via the web form: https://t.co/hiamZCHAO2. Kind regards, Ivana

urls.description: Have you won a competition or do you have questions about a voucher? Get in touch and we will be happy to provide information for your specific situation.

data.text: @johnpeters10 Hi John, please send us your inquiry in a DM. We will be happy to have a closer look. Kind regards, Sara

@DivinZotto Dear Yannick, we're sorry that you have been affected by a flight irregularity and we want to apologize for the inconvenience caused. To bring your concern to further notice and to claim compensation, please use the respective online form: https://t.co/sVvUhmsLWy BR, Christiane

data.text:
We are joining the fight against #FoodWaste!🥪

With our pilot project “Austrian Melangerie To Go” our flight guests can now save unconsumed products from our onboard product range from going to waste. 

Our goal? Reduce food waste to a minimum! 🗑️

👉 https://t.co/DVmMzTH29I https://t.co/yu6ISkCCm1
@GarethMorgan18 Hi Gareth, please send us your booking code in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris
@69Gramps Hi, please DM us your booking code and we'll check your rebooking options. Kind regards, James

#AustrianAirlines is setting an example by already starting to #flygreener this year with the voluntary deployment of 1,500 tons of #SAF by @omv!

👉https://t.co/CGk09uS6Pw
2/2

@BMKlimaschutz

Ambitions are important, but we are already acting! 💪

We support the eager targets for the use of sustainable aviation fuels #SAF from 2025, but achieving them requires significant investments from national governments and should not distort competition. 
1/2
RT @lufthansaNews: Kontinuität beim Klimaschutz: Die globale Rating-Organisation @CDP hat der Lufthansa Group im vierten Jahr in Folge ein…

data.text:
West Coast, best coast?🤩

From 20 May, we will fly you non-stop from #Vienna to #LosAngeles with five weekly connections!✈️

This summer, our European route network will also be expanded with new destinations such as Valencia🇪🇸 & Kavala🇬🇷!

👉 https://t.co/nwDDGNJTEu https://t.co/6MM6e4wXnz

@VR_Travelling Hi, ja das ist möglich. Bitte beachte, dass dein Golf Equipment nicht das max. Gewicht von 23kg übersteigt und du es vorher bei uns via specialcases@austrian.com anmeldest. Liebe Grüße, Derya
@Jo98143576 @krone_at @derStandardat Hallo Jo, woher hast du diese Information bzw. gerne kannst du uns in einer DM näheres dazu erzählen. Liebe Grüße, James https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

data.text: @xxjessicanxx Hi Jess, due to the very high volume of inquiries sent to us the processing times are much longer than usual. Please have a little patient with us, our colleagues will definetly get back to you as soon as possible. Best regards, Funda
pretty legs dancing at sunrise... 💃🏽✈️🌅 https://t.co/pbNllr8S7g
@bradley27297392 Hi there, please send us your booking code in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris

@randomtomtom Hi Thomas, we are sorry that you were facing difficulties trying to send our online form. Is there anything we can assist you with? If you are referring to an already existing reservation, please send us the booking code and your request in a DM. Kind regards, Chris
@deerus1 Hi there, we are sorry to hear you have been affected by a cancellation. Please send us your booking code in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris
@itscanicia Hi there, we already replied to your DM. Kind regards, Chris

@katcc123 Hi Kat, Please contact our colleagues via the following form regarding a possible refund: https://t.co/qtHWqUZJ9O Due to the high amount of requests we receive at the moment we ask for your understanding that the response can take longer than usual. Kind regards, Chris

urls.description: You can request refunds for a flight booked on the Austrian Airlines website via our contact form. We’re here to help.

data.text: @MLGR1996 Hallo Mario, der Flug OS 381 / 17 JAN hat leider aufgrund der Wetterverhältnisse nicht in Lviv landen können. Liebe Grüße, Christiane

@esanem99 Hi Simmo, no, your children won't have to sit next to a stranger. If you're booked together in one reservation, you'll receive seats next to each other as subject to availability. Best regards, Christiane
@BobFox60205252 Hi there, we're sorry you did not receive a reply yet. If you have used the Feedback web form online, our colleagues will get back to you as soon as possible. Kind regards, Ivana
@69gramps Hi, please send us your request including your booking details. Kind regards, Karin
@papoii_ Hi, we are very sorry that your luggage did not arrive with you. We are sorry for the inconvenience. Kind regards, Karin
@Rafi_Farkas Hi, danke für deine netten Worte. Bis bald! 😃Liebe Grüße, Christine
@SP72202848 Hi, we regret to read that you didn't received any answer via e-mail yet. Please send us your E-Mail ID in a DM so that we can have a closer look. Thank you! Kind regards, Christine
